works.description:
Mix Master Online é um MMORPG que tira  
muito de sua inspiração do sistema de combates presente na série Pokémon.  
Como parte de um mundo repleto de magia, o jogador assume o papel de um  
aventureiro que pode capturar uma grande variedade de criaturas,  
misturando-as a outras com o objetivo de gerar um lutador ainda mais  
poderoso.

A. Aurora Games Corp. (Licensor), a company duly organized and existing  
under the laws of Republic of Korea with registered principal place of  
business at 997 Daechi-dong, Gangnam-gu, Seoul, Korea, represented by  
Keesun Hong, in his capacity as the Chief Executive Officer, and

B. BGDPC Entertainment Ltda (Licensee), a company duly organized and  
existing under the laws of Brazil with registered principal place of  
business at 535, Hortencio Mendonca Ribeiro, Alto da Boa Vista, Ribeirão  
Preto, São Paulo, Brazil, 14025-590 represented by Ricardo Dinucci, in his  
capacity as the Chief Executive Officer. (“Licensee”)

(Individually, a “Party” and collectively, the “Parties”)


RECITALS

WHEREAS, Licensor has developed and is marketing an online game software  
named "Mix Master ";


WHEREAS, Licensee will be licensed to operate the game in certain Territory  
with Local Language (as defined hereafter);


WHEREAS, Licensee requests to obtain from Licensor, and Licensor grant  
Licensee, a license, in the Territory (as hereinafter defined), to its  
required technology and other proprietary information and materials to  
operate the “Mix Master ” game in the Territory; and


WHEREAS, Licensor is willing to license the exclusive rights on the  
Software to Licensee in the Territory (as defined hereafter);


NOW, THEREFORE, after friendly consultations conducted in accordance with  
the principles  of  equality  and  equal  benefit,  intending  to  be   
legally  bound  hereby,  the Parties have agreed as follows:
